name: Sticks (itch)
description:
Sticks is a brain killer where you try to solve different puzzles in a 2d world consisting of colorful sticks.

Sticks is all about sticks as you may have guessed from the name. The main objective is to remove all the sticks on the screen with a set of rules.

1. The centre part displays a number of other sticks a stick has to touch to be clickable.
2. The Edge part displays a number of other sticks a stick is currently touching.
3. When a clickable stick is clicked you gain 1 super click (can't be stored for later use).
4. When no super click is available you have to click on a clickable stick.

Who am i?
I am a 16 year old boy who have been working with gamedev for the past 1½ years (im still in school and work with it as a hobby). I'm very excited to release my first game ever which is you may have guessed it, Sticks. It is made with unity in c# and programmed in visual studio, the art is all made by me with inkscape. The sound effects are made with 2 hammers and a microphone ;).
